caption.p: Temporal changes in environmental and ecological parameters at sampling sites from October 2016 to June 2018. Air sampling was conducted weekly except during the summer holiday in 2017 (weeks 19â€“35). The recorded mean (temperature, humidity, carbon dioxide [CO 2] concentration) or absolute (numbers of occupants on site) values at different sampling sites are shown in dots of different colors. Locally estimated scatterplot smoothing regression fitted 95% confidence interval ranges are shown in gray. Temporal changes in indoor temperature ( A), indoor relative humidity ( B), indoor absolute humidity ( C), numbers of occupants on site ( D), and ventilation rate ( E), are shown. Abbreviation: UHS, University Health Service.
